name: Snake3D (1234ab)
description:
Everyone knows the game snake, this is a 3D adaptation, where you control the snake in a cuboid from third person perspective. There are obstacles (rocks) and rewards (oranges).

This was a small project of mine – I should say concept – , it's available on GitHub: https://github.com/4321ba/snake3d

CONTROLS:
Keyboard: Turn with WASD or arrows, R to restart.
Touch: touch the corresponding part of the screen to turn.

You can also watch gameplay on YouTube (sorry if it showed twice):

The web version needs WebGL2, which Safari and Edge (I guess the old one) doesn't have. Download it or use Firefox or Chromium.

I didn't test the Mac version at all, and neither the Windows one natively, so comment if something's wrong.

Also comment, if you liked it! I would love some feedback.
